languages.text: {n}Уралон отшатывается назад. Кроваво-красная броня его промята вашими ударами, а на лице застыла гримаса боли. Он обращает безумные глаза к Кунраду, барахтающемуся в собственной крови.{/n} "Брат Сумерки, час, что был тебе обещан, пришел. Предел рассвета дарует тебе честь служить его орудием. Восхитись своей особой судьбой!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Зайдясь в громогласном кашле, Уралон отшатывается назад. Кроваво-красная броня его промята вашими ударами, а на лице застыла гримаса боли. Он обращает безумные глаза к Кунраду, барахтающемуся в собственной крови.{/n} "Брат Сумерки, нельзя более мешкать! Пришел твой час исполнить высшую миссию. Тебе дарована честь служить орудием самого Предела Рассвета. Восхитись своей особой судьбой!"
traits.speaker: DarkApostleMob

languages.text: {n}Uralon staggers back from the blow. Your strikes have crumpled his blood-red armour, and his face bears a grimace of pain. He turns his mad eyes to Voigtvir, who is thrashing in his own blood.{/n} "Brother Twilight, the hour that was promised to you has come. The Edge of Daybreak grants you the honour of serving as his weapon. Be awed by your high destiny!"

languages.text: {n}乌拉隆被打得踉跄后退。你的攻击刺穿了他血红色的护甲，他的脸上露出了痛苦的狰狞之意。他将疯狂的目光投向了维特威尔，而维特威尔被自己的鲜血浸透了。{/n}“暮光兄弟，我之前承诺的时刻已然到来。破晓锋刃赐予了你荣耀，允许你成为他的武器！为你的光荣使命欢呼吧！”
languages.original_text: {n}Uralon staggers back from the blow. Your strikes have crumpled his blood-red armour, and his face bears a grimace of pain. He turns his mad eyes to Voigtvir, who is thrashing in his own blood.{/n} "Brother Twilight, the hour that was promised to you has come. The Edge of Daybreak grants you the honour of serving as his weapon. Be awed by your high destiny!"

traits.locale_text: {n}乌拉隆被打得踉跄后退。你的攻击刺穿了他血红色的护甲，他的脸上露出了痛苦的狰狞之意。他将疯狂的目光投向了维特威尔，而维特威尔被自己的鲜血浸透了。{/n}“暮光兄弟，我之前承诺的时刻已然到来。破晓锋刃赐予了你荣耀，允许你成为他的武器！为你的光荣使命欢呼吧！”
traits.speaker: DarkApostleMob

languages.text: {n}La force de l'impact fait reculer Uralon. Vos coups ont déformé son armure écarlate et une grimace de douleur lui tord le visage. Il pose son regard dément sur Voigtvir, qui se débat dans son propre sang.{/n} « Frère Crépuscule, le moment qui vous avait été promis est arrivé. La Lame de l'Aube vous accorde l'honneur de lui servir d'arme. Émerveillez-vous de cette grande destinée ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Uralon staggers back from the blow. Your strikes have crumpled his blood-red armour, and his face bears a grimace of pain. He turns his mad eyes to Voigtvir, who is thrashing in his own blood.{/n} "Brother Twilight, the hour that was promised to you has come. The Edge of Daybreak grants you the honour of serving as his weapon. Be awed by your high destiny!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La force de l'impact fait reculer Uralon. Vos coups ont déformé son armure écarlate et une grimace de douleur lui tord le visage. Il pose son regard dément sur Voigtvir, qui se débat dans son propre sang.{/n} « Frère Crépuscule, le moment qui vous avait été promis est arrivé. La Lame de l'Aube vous accorde l'honneur de lui servir d'arme. Émerveillez-vous de cette grande destinée ! »
traits.speaker: DarkApostleMob

languages.text: {n}ウラロンがよろめく。こちらが放った一撃で彼の血のように赤い鎧は崩れ、顔は苦痛の笑みを浮かべている。彼は自らの血でのたうち回るボイトヴィルに狂気の目を向ける。{/n}「薄明の兄弟よ、約束の時が来た。暁の刃は剣の役割としての栄誉をお前に授けた。自らの高き運命に畏怖しろ！」
languages.original_text: {n}Uralon staggers back from the blow. Your strikes have crumpled his blood-red armour, and his face bears a grimace of pain. He turns his mad eyes to Voigtvir, who is thrashing in his own blood.{/n} "Brother Twilight, the hour that was promised to you has come. The Edge of Daybreak grants you the honour of serving as his weapon. Be awed by your high destiny!"

traits.locale_text: {n}ウラロンがよろめく。こちらが放った一撃で彼の血のように赤い鎧は崩れ、顔は苦痛の笑みを浮かべている。彼は自らの血でのたうち回るボイトヴィルに狂気の目を向ける。{/n}「薄明の兄弟よ、約束の時が来た。暁の刃は剣の役割としての栄誉をお前に授けた。自らの高き運命に畏怖しろ！」
traits.speaker: DarkApostleMob

languages.text: {n}Uralon recula ante tu golpe. Tus ataques han abollado su armadura, roja como la sangre, y su rostro es una mueca de dolor. Dirige su mirada enloquecida hacia Voigtvir, que se debate en su propia sangre.{/n} «Hermano Crepúsculo, ha llegado la hora prometida. El Filo del Amanecer te concede el honor de servir como su arma. ¡Alégrate al ver la magnitud de tu sino!».
languages.original_text: {n}Uralon staggers back from the blow. Your strikes have crumpled his blood-red armour, and his face bears a grimace of pain. He turns his mad eyes to Voigtvir, who is thrashing in his own blood.{/n} "Brother Twilight, the hour that was promised to you has come. The Edge of Daybreak grants you the honour of serving as his weapon. Be awed by your high destiny!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Uralon recula ante tu golpe. Tus ataques han abollado su armadura, roja como la sangre, y su rostro es una mueca de dolor. Dirige su mirada enloquecida hacia Voigtvir, que se debate en su propia sangre.{/n} «Hermano Crepúsculo, ha llegado la hora prometida. El Filo del Amanecer te concede el honor de servir como su arma. ¡Alégrate al ver la magnitud de tu sino!».
traits.speaker: DarkApostleMob

languages.text: {n}Der Schlag lässt Uralon zurücktaumeln. Deine Hiebe haben seine blutrote Rüstung verbeult, und sein Gesicht ist eine Grimasse der Schmerzen. Er richtet seine rasenden Augen auf Voigtvir, der in seinem eigenen Blut zuckt.{/n} "Bruder Zwielicht, die Stunde, die Euch versprochen wurde, ist gekommen. Der Rand des Tagesanbruchs gewährt Euch die Ehre, als seine Waffe zu dienen. Eure hohe Bestimmung soll Euch mit Ehrfurcht erfüllen!"
languages.original_text: {n}Uralon staggers back from the blow. Your strikes have crumpled his blood-red armour, and his face bears a grimace of pain. He turns his mad eyes to Voigtvir, who is thrashing in his own blood.{/n} "Brother Twilight, the hour that was promised to you has come. The Edge of Daybreak grants you the honour of serving as his weapon. Be awed by your high destiny!"

Der Rand des Tagesanbruchs gewährt Euch die Ehre, als seine Waffe zu dienen. Eure hohe Bestimmung soll Euch mit Ehrfurcht erfüllen!"

languages.text: {n}Uralon, darbenin etkisiyle geriye yalpalıyor. Darbelerin, Uralon'un kan kırmızısı zırhını ezmiş gibi görünüyor. Kâfir, yüzünü acıyla buruşturuyor. Çılgın gözlerini kendi kanında debelenen Voigtvir'e çeviriyor.{/n} "Rahip Seher, sana vadedilen saat geldi. Tan Vakti, silahı olma onurunu sana bahşediyor. Yüce kaderin karşısında saygıyla eğil!"
languages.original_text: {n}Uralon staggers back from the blow. Your strikes have crumpled his blood-red armour, and his face bears a grimace of pain. He turns his mad eyes to Voigtvir, who is thrashing in his own blood.{/n} "Brother Twilight, the hour that was promised to you has come. The Edge of Daybreak grants you the honour of serving as his weapon. Be awed by your high destiny!"
